p: According to this scheme, among the 96,606 formulations of Traditional Chinese Medicine, the 574 drugs were selected, and only 26 ones remained after the third stage of analysis. These biologicaly activity substances from the licorice ( Glycyrrhizae radix) and skullcaps ( Scutellariae baicalensis) could also interact with the targets involving in immune and inflammation diseases ( Ren et al., 2020).
